security: Information is restricted and has been redacted in the document.
summary: This is an agent report regarding David Reed Fromer. It details a local agency check requested from the FBI in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, and the subsequent results received.
summary_one_paragraph: On February 14, 1967, Special Agent Robert E. Little of the 113th MI GP (I) submitted an agent report concerning David Reed Fromer, born on July 21, 1942, in Chicago, Illinois. The report indicates that on January 26, 1967, a request was made to the FBI in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, for a file check on Fromer, and the results were received on February 2, 1967, as detailed in an attached letter.
title: Agent Report on David Reed Fromer
